entry.content:
Introduction

Perceptron is kind of supervised learning for binary classifier. It is an algorithm for learning the threshold function.

Model building

Assume we have a linearly separable data set, ensuring that the algorithm can converge. Our objective is to separate the sample points using a hyperplane, whose normal vector is determined by minimizing the loss function associated with the misclassified points. It should be noted that this solution is not unique.
